1.content:
The sun is high. It's a beautiful day. It's warm but there is a gentle breeze. You wish you could just go to the park or to one of the outdoor pools but you have things to do.

Where are you going?
1.title: No time for fun

choices: statues. We can use this to capture enemies
11.content: You're not the only one. You gather in a warehouse with several other soldiers. The warehouse is empty except for one giant machine. There are a few people in lab coats around the machine. Captain Goyle called, "Attention, this is the Army Scientific Facilitation Regiment. You have been transferred to this regiment to help us in our research. We have found a way to transform people into _____."
11.title: to a military base

12.content:
Your friend Dave is a scientist. You are a jock. You don't have much in common but Dave does enjoy football and he has tutored you in science.

Dave has invented something and has asked if you would be a guinea pig. He assures you that he has tested it on animals and restored them. He even demonstrates on a cat that he then restores. You agree to be his guinea pig but now you are nervous. Dave insists that you undress because it only works on organic things. Some clothes qualify as organic but buttons, zippers and synthetic materials can interfere with the experiment. You prepare for Dave to turn you into _____.
12.title: to visit a friend

124.content:
On your way to Dave's, you see a newspaper. The front page story tells how Superbman and Arachnidman decide to team up. Dave was inspired to pursue gadgeteering by the Flying Foxman.

You get to Dave's and he shows you his invention. You say, "That looks like an antique clothes wringer."

Dave says, "Well it's not. You put yourself in through here and come out made of spandex."
124.title: spandex

13.content:
You are pledging Sigma Phi Beta. All the pledges are supposed to meet at the pledge house. You don't know what to expect.

After the initial meet and greet, you learn that this fraternity does have an initiation, a unique one. As an initiation, they are going to change you into _____.
13.title: to college

14.content: You just got this job. This is your first day of work. You're not actually going to work. You need training. You are going to be operating the machines and you need three weeks of training to learn the different machines. The company you work for makes _____.
14.title: to work

1451.content: Twenty years ago, scientists discovered a chemical that had magic properties. It was a compound of thorium and antimony that was turned into a liquid at room temperature. The liquid had unpredictable effects. The first two people who touched the liquid were transformed. One became taller and thinner. The other grew an extra hand on his chin. It took scientists a long time to figure out how to make the liquid more predictable but they could only get the liquid to do one thing predictably, _____.
1451.title: Magic

15.content: I will change these chapter titles after the chapters are written.
15.title: someplace else

info.brief_description: Men become robots, statues or inanimate objects.
info.description:
One day, you learn about a new technology that can transform men into robots, statues or inanimate objects. The transformations can be reversed. The transformed men remain at least partially aware but their awareness may be severely reduced. (My preference is they lose awareness of the passage of time but remain aware of being touched or handled but this is not a requirement.)

Anything goes except death, underage, and gross.

The theme is men being transformed. Female characters are allowed and can even be transformed but the focus should be men being transformed.

GP given for good chapters. Bad chapters and chapters that don't fit the theme will be edited or deleted.
